title: Enhancing E-Learning Practical Skills: Climate Change Response and Waste Management IVR Simulation Training

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more ways climate change impacts waste management.
Learners can perform waste sorting and recycling processes with 90% accuracy via IVR simulation.
Learners can improve their environmental behavioral intention scale by over 20% post-training.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
